state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an life changing round of TextWorld? You do! First off, try to venture east. After that, try to venture east. Following that, go to the south. Okay, and then, move east. If you can finish that, attempt to venture south. Next, head west. With that over with, take a trip north. With that accomplished, make an effort to venture north. After that, try to take a trip north. Once you accomplish that, go north. Then, go north. Okay, and then, move west. Once you succeed at that, take a trip west. And then, try to go to the south. After that, recover the coin from the floor of the garage. Got that? Good! -= Chamber =- You arrive in a chamber.
